   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(tc_repeat_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -suite_defaults([{timetrap, {minutes, 10}}]).
   24: 
   25: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   26: -compile(export_all).
   27: 
   28: -include("ct.hrl").
   29: 
   30: init_per_group(_Group,Config) ->
   31:     Config.
   32: 
   33: end_per_group(_Group,Config) ->
   34:     ok.
   35: 
   36: all() ->
   37:     [{testcase,tc1,[{repeat,2}]},
   38:      {testcase,tc2,[{repeat_until_ok,3}]},
   39:      {testcase,tc3,[{repeat_until_ok,3}]},
   40:      {testcase,tc4,[{repeat_until_fail,3}]},
   41:      {group,g},
   42:      {group,g_until_ok},
   43:      {group,g_until_fail},
   44:      {group,g,[parallel]},
   45:      {group,g,[sequence]},
   46:      {group,g_mixed,[sequence]}].
   47: 
   48: groups() ->
   49:     [{g,[{testcase,tc1,[{repeat,2}]}]},
   50:      {g_until_ok,[{testcase,tc2,[{repeat_until_ok,3}]}]},
   51:      {g_until_fail,[{testcase,tc4,[{repeat_until_fail,3}]}]},
   52:      {g_parallel_until_ok,[parallel],[{testcase,tc2,[{repeat_until_ok,3}]}]},
   53:      {g_parallel_until_fail,[parallel],[{testcase,tc1,[{repeat_until_fail,2}]}]},
   54:      {g_sequence_until_ok,[sequence],[{testcase,tc2,[{repeat_until_ok,3}]}]},
   55:      {g_sequence_until_fail,[sequence],[{testcase,tc1,[{repeat_until_fail,2}]}]},
   56:      {g_mixed,[{testcase,tc1,[{repeat,2}]},
   57:                {testcase,tc4,[{repeat,3}]},
   58:                tc1,
   59:                {group,g},
   60:                {subgroup,[tc1,{testcase,tc2,[{repeat,2}]}]},
   61:                {testcase,tc2,[{repeat,2}]},
   62:                tc2,
   63:                {testcase,tc1,[{repeat,2}]},
   64:                tc1]}].
   65: 
   66: %% Test cases starts here.
   67: tc1(_Config) ->
   68:     ok.
   69: 
   70: tc2(_Config) ->
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: tc3(_Config) ->
   74:     ct:fail(always_fail).
   75: 
   76: tc4(Config) ->
   77:     case ?config(saved_config,Config) of
   78:         {tc4,_} ->
   79:             ct:fail(second_time_fail);
   80:         undefined ->
   81:             {save_config,Config}
   82:     end.
   83: 
   84: tc5(_Config) ->
   85:     {skip,"just skip this"}.
